boat.full_description: Log A-S/95 Owns Eve, for sale Log Sept 04, and on web.  Designed by Peter Blandell at Penarth Boat Building co. in 1969 for his own use and an intended world cruise. She is scaled down Laurent Giles Dyarchy design. Soon after launching she was badly damaged when she broke her mooring. She returned to the yard for repairs. She was sold to John Stistec who cruised her extensively to the Cape Verde Islands, Dacca, Caribbean Islands, Bahamas, East Coast of Maine to Chesapeake and back to Cowes via the Azores. Her present owners have sailed her to Brittany Portugal, Porto Santo and the Azores. She is an excellent strong sea kindly boat.
boat.name: Fsi Fsi
